name: Possessing Aka
description:
Possessing Aka is a short, one sitting, interactive fiction game about a kid named Jake who must take down the reign of Aka Manah, a demon who possesses the mind of everyone on earth, with the help of Planet Zu. Jake learns that emotions are one hell of a ride!

  • A text-based adventure game.
  • Can be played in one sitting.
  • Multiple paths.
